item.title: I just learned a valuable lesson when finding new spots to take photos and make content. Learn from my mistake. PS. My GoPro also wasn’t on and my helmet was on my bike when this happened. #biketok #bikelife #bikerboy #beginner #motorbike #booktok #bikers

item.title: Whats the biggest piece of advice you would give to a new or young rider? Ill go first!! Do not throw yourself into the deep end to try catch up with others. Gradually introduce yourself to new situations and build your skills. Enjoy, trust the process

item.title: It doesnt matter whether you have chicken strips or not. But if you must get rid of them, its about taking a corner correctly. The most important part of taking a corner is to LOOK where you want to go. Look through the corner and the bike will go there.
item.description: It doesnt matter whether you have chicken strips or not. But if you must get rid of them, its about taking a corner correctly. The most important part of taking a corner is to LOOK where you want to go. Look through the corner and the bike will go there.
item.author: baz.motorsport

item.title: No hate towards anyone at all…. Get that bag. But for us as spectators, we just need to remind ourselves, that not everything we see online is the norm. Understand the difference of what’s good and bad…. And enjoy the platform! Peace ✌️ #bikerlife #tikto
